name: Lighthouse Keeper (joeld42)
description:
You are the lighthouse keeper in this story puzzle game. Place land tiles, gather resources and try to maximize your score to bring balance to the landscape and achieve your goals.

Note: this was made for luxe jam #1. It's still sorta incomplete, and it certainly fell outside of the time limits of the jam and I had some help with the artwork, so it's not strictly a qualifying entry but I had fun making it and learning luxe engine (https://createwith.luxe) and that was the point.
